thread.title: Lydia Ko takes 4-shot lead in LPGA Taiwan Championship
thread.title_full: Lydia Ko takes 4-shot lead in LPGA Taiwan Championship

title: Lydia Ko takes 4-shot lead in LPGA Taiwan Championship
text:
Lydia Ko takes 4-shot lead in LPGA Taiwan Championship Associated Press | 0 comments 
TAIPEI, Taiwan (AP) — Lydia Ko took a four-stroke lead Saturday in the LPGA Taiwan Championship, putting the 18-year-old New Zealander in position to regain the top spot in the world ranking. 
Ko had four birdies in a five-hole stretch and closed with another birdie for a 5-under 67 in windy conditions at rain-soaked Miramar. kAm$96 H@F=5 ;F>A 7C@> D64@?5 E@ 7:CDE :?
